title: Policy Learning under Endogeneity Using Instrumental Variables
abstract: arXiv:2206.09883v3 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: This paper studies the identification and estimation of individualized intervention policies in observational data settings characterized by endogenous treatment selection and the availability of instrumental variables. We introduce encouragement rules that manipulate an instrument. Incorporating the marginal treatment effects (MTE) as policy invariant structural parameters, we establish the identification of the social welfare criterion for the optimal encouragement rule. Focusing on binary encouragement rules, we propose to estimate the optimal policy via the Empirical Welfare Maximization (EWM) method and derive convergence rates of the regret (welfare loss). We consider extensions to accommodate multiple instruments and budget constraints. translated_title: 使用工具变量在内生性下的政策学习
translated_abstract: 本文研究了在内生性处理选择和可用工具变量特征的观察数据环境中个性化干预政策的识别和估计。我们引入操纵工具的鼓励规则。将边际处理效应（MTE）作为政策不变结构参数，我们建立了最优鼓励规则的社会福利准则的识别。着重于二值鼓励规则，我们提出通过经验福利最大化（EWM）方法估计最优政策，并推导后悔（福利损失）的收敛速率。我们考虑了适应多个工具和预算约束的扩展。利用印度尼西亚家庭生活调查的数据，我们应用EWM鼓励规则对最佳学费补贴分配进行咨询。我们的框架提供了关于为什么要进行某种干预的解释能力。
tldr: 本文通过引入操纵工具的鼓励规则，在内生性处理选择和可用工具变量特征的观察数据环境中，建立了最优鼓励规则的社会福利准则的识别，并提出了经验福利最大化（EWM）方法以及福利损失的收敛速率。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces encouragement rules that manipulate an instrument to study the identification of optimal encouragement rules for individualized intervention policies under endogenous treatment selection and instrumental variables, proposing the Empirical Welfare Maximization (EWM) method for estimating the optimal policy and deriving convergence rates of welfare loss.
